sense.gloss: running out of battery, battery depletion, going flat, going dead
loss of energy, depletion of stamina

sdata.j: うわ、↑最悪↑↓さいあく↓なタイミングで|↑電池↑↓でんち↓↑切↑↓き↓れ|やがった。
sdata.e: Ugh, the battery just had to die at the worst time.

sdata.j: やばい、↑携帯↑↓けいたい↓の|↑電池↑↓でんち↓↑切↑↓き↓れ|そう。↑寝↑↓ね↓てる↑間↑↓あいだ↓に↑充電↑↓じゅうでん↓しとけばよかった。
sdata.e: Oh no, my mobile phone battery's about to run out. I should have charged it while I was sleeping.

sdata.j: 「やばい、|↑電池↑↓でんち↓↑切↑↓き↓れ|そう」「↑寝↑↓ね↓てる↑間↑↓ま↓に↑充電↑↓じゅうでん↓しとけばよかったのに」
sdata.e: “Yikes, my battery’s nearly dead.” “You should have charged it overnight while you were sleeping.”
